tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently had the pleasure of visiting Dr. Sanjeev Kalra for a root canal procedure, and I must say that it was the best experience I've had with this type of procedure. As someone who has had multiple root canals before, I can confidently say that Dr. Kalra is an expert in his field

From the moment I walked into his office, I was impressed with the professional and welcoming environment. Dr. Kalra explained the procedure and answered all of my questions with patience and clarity. He made sure that I was comfortable throughout the entire process, which was greatly appreciated.

During the procedure itself, I was amazed at how smoothly everything went. There was literally ‚Äúno pain‚Äù, which was surprising and a welcome relief compared to my previous experiences. His staff was professional and responsive, which made me feel even more at ease.

If you're in need of any dental work, especially a root canal, I highly recommend Dr. Kalra. You won't be disappointed!
reply_text: Thank you for taking time out for the feedback and your kind words.

review:
Since he was not the primary doctor attending to the patient (my child), he was extremely thorough in ensuring what needed to be done (before starting the procedure) so that there were no mistakes due to miscommunication. 

The actual treatment was done with minimal pain and discomfort to the patient. Post extraction care was also explained clearly multiple times.

He also interacted in a very friendly manner pre, during and post the procedure to put everyone in their comfort zone. 

All in all, a very nice experience for my child who was extremely nervous before we reached the clinic.
reply_text: Thanks for your kind words.

An absolutely delightful experience if a visit to the dentist could be called that!!! I was petrified of a root canal but it was a breeze and almost no pain post the procedure. Dr Sanjiv Karla kept me in the loop throughout thereby alleviating any anxiety. Dr Manav Kalra did two fillings and also fixed my broken front tooth which now looks like it had never been chipped. 
My first visit to Dr Kalra's visit and I'm certain my entire family shall be consulting them for all our dental concerns in the future!!
